quality_vinyl: Quality vinyl records for collectors and music enthusiasts.
discover_best_vinyls: Discover the best vinyl records and find your favorite artists' albums!
quote_2: "A good record says more than a thousand words."
quote_3: "Vinyl is forever – listen to the past, live the present."
search_placeholder: Search by title, artist, or genre..
about_description: We are a small business dealing with vinyl records, currently operating in Hungary. The development of our webshop is handled by three enthusiastic professionals. Our records come exclusively from second-hand sources, so each piece holds a unique story.
faq_answer_1: We store your orders in a database, where the vinyl records are forwarded to a second party and we provide them to you.
faq_question_2: Aren't you violating any rights with this?
faq_answer_2: No, with our records we provide a service where we create your mp3 files with your images. We don't sell them commercially.
faq_answer_3: Our records are sold as used on the main page. If you want to sell your records to us, you can inquire at our store in Vácduka.
faq_answer_4: We can read any mp3, mp4, WAV., WAV files. We recommend using these formats.
